Articles.Content:
A fun very inefficient space craft, that kinda works, This is the SRE (Space Research and Exploration) Vehicle [Light] v5.

After about 12 variants of this design i only had one that had worked, kinda. It can get into orbit and sit in a parking orbit in LKO, Interplanetary is the fun part. because of the imbalance of the spacecraft, A-SAS is unreliable and its best just to control it yourself.

Photos of it in space, http://imgur.com/a/VyTo1#0

In the first picture you can see Eve in the bottom left, due to my amazing pilot skills i managed to get captured by Eve, but am 80,000 Km away.

This is my first Upload on this forum, all criticism is welcomed.

DOWNLOAD:

http://www./?d7uqth2mu7u3uh0
Looks nice. Kind of looks like that ships on Stargate Atlantis, if you've seen it.

Looks nice. Kind of looks like that ships on Stargate Atlantis, if you've seen it.

I haven't seen Stargate Atlantis, I probably should now
It is balanced? Does it handle well in space? If so, it is very cool!
In space, it is stable with A SAS but when you get to a lower amount of fuel it tends to pitch up, almost uncontrollably. So I Induce a fast rotation, to counteract the large amount of upwards pitch.
